name: Difficulty Progression
description: Difficulty increases as you play levels

lives.description: Sets an amount of lives available while playing levels.
lives.name: Lives

levels-per-diff.description: Sets an amount of levels per one difficilty.
levels-per-diff.name: Levels Per Difficulty

reset-lives-after-quit.description: Allows mod to reset lives after quit from the minigame.
reset-lives-after-quit.name: Reset Lives After Quit

skip-cost.description: Sets an amount of lives to be lost when skipping any level.
skip-cost.name: Cost of Skip

update-diff-after-skip.description: Allows mod to set difficulty for the next level after skip.
update-diff-after-skip.name: Update Difficulty After Skip

debug-mode.description: Enables debug mode. Expect a lot of output in terminal.
debug-mode.name: Debug Mode

reset-previous-seed.description: After you change seed mod automatically resets previous one. This behaviour can be disabled.
reset-previous-seed.name: Reset Previous Seed
